title: [Gameplay] Twitch Audio Bug
body: Playing a game in Urf as Aatrox. My team had a Twitch and everytime he placed a ward I could hear his warding quote no matter where I was on the map. I don't know if anyone else could cause no one would talk to me so it may be a really weird Aatrox bug or a Twitch bug

replies.body: this is happening with Azir too

Hey! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of global audio when warding and are currently investigating. ^-^
